references: A. Murthy, A note on the conjecture that the Smarandache nn-square (n concatenated with n square) sequence contains no perfect squares (to be published in the Smarandache Notions Journal).
formula: a(n) = 10^floor(1 + 2log_10  n) + n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 20 2012
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 17 2001
